title: Plate, "Medallions", 1948
markings: Marks: On underside: (in Russian) "A. Vorobyevsky / November / 1948 / Medallions" hand-painted in blue overglaze
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Circular; painted in blue with some gilding; in the center a reserve with flower; around the border six reserves with stylized animals, a man, and a ship; scroll pattern in background

tombstone.epitaph:
Plate, "Medallions", 1948.
1948. porcelain, glaze, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-34.
